com.incoming.pvnsdk

Class PushVideoAdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.incoming.au.PushVideoAdManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener

    public abstract class PushVideoAdManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener
    Host applications that wish to deliver advertisements should use the advertising SDK of their choice to implement this adapter and register for to receives requests to play advertisements at PushVideo#configureAdManager(PushVideoAdManager).

      • PushVideoAdManager

        public PushVideoAdManager()

    • Method Detail

      • playAdvertisement

        public abstract void playAdvertisement()
        Called by the Push Video SDK to request the advertising service to play an advertisement. The implementation of this method should call onAdComplete(AdCompletionCode, int) once the advertisement has played.

      • isAdvertismentReady

        public abstract boolean isAdvertismentReady()
        Checks if the advertising service has an advertisement ready to display. The Push Video SDK will not request an advertisement if this is false.
        Returns:
        true if the advertising service has an advertisement ready to display.

      • onPause

        public abstract void onPause(android.app.Activity activity)

      • onResume

        public abstract void onResume(android.app.Activity activity)

      • onAdComplete

        public void onAdComplete(PushVideoAdManager.AdCompletionCode completionCode,
                         int amountWatched)
        Call when the advertisement has completed.
        Parameters:
        completionCode - completion code
        amountWatched -
